name: Easy Map For Elementor
author: @reza_qsr

sections.description:
The Easy Map For Elementor Widget makes it simple to add and customize multiple map locations on your website. Users can input latitude and longitude or click on the map to add points, offering flexibility and ease. Additional customization options, like adjusting map width, height, and border radius, help tailor the map’s appearance to match your website’s design.

Key Features:
* Add multiple locations by entering latitude/longitude or clicking directly on the map.
* Edit and update previously added map points.
* Customize map dimensions and border radius.
* Enable geodesic lines between locations for visual connections (optional).

Designed for users who need to showcase specific locations, this widget seamlessly integrates with Elementor.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the easy-map folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Open Elementor and drag the Easy Map widget into any page to start adding custom map locations.
sections.faq:
How do I add locations?

You can add locations by inputting the latitude and longitude directly or by clicking on the map to drop a pin.

Can I customize the mapâ€™s appearance?

Yes, you can adjust the map’s width, height, and border radius, as well as enable geodesic lines for a more customized look.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Initial release with support for adding multiple map locations, customization options, and easy editing.

short_description: The Easy Map For Elementor allows users to easily add custom locations on a map by entering latitude and longitude or selecting a point.
